hero.name: Your Name
hero.title: Web Developer & Freelancer
hero.description: I create stunning websites for businesses and individuals looking to stand out in the digital world. With expertise in modern web technologies, I deliver high-quality solutions that help my clients achieve their goals.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.heading: I'm a Passionate Web Developer & Freelancer
about.paragraph1: With over 5 years of experience in web development, I specialize in creating responsive, user-friendly websites and web applications that help businesses grow their online presence.
about.paragraph2: I'm passionate about combining beautiful design with clean, efficient code to deliver exceptional user experiences. My approach is client-focused, ensuring that every project meets the unique needs and goals of the businesses I work with.
